trans-unit.source: Represents a design-time editor sheet for the properties of a <xref uid="langword_csharp_RouteUrl" name="RouteUrl" href=""></xref> expression in the UI of a designer host at design time.
trans-unit.target: 表示屬性的設計階段編輯器工作表<xref uid="langword_csharp_RouteUrl" name="RouteUrl" href=""></xref>運算式在 UI 中的設計工具主應用程式在設計階段。

trans-unit.source: The visual designer uses the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditor> class together with the RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet class to select the individual properties of a `RouteUrl` expression, and to combine the selected expression property values into a `RouteUrl` expression.
trans-unit.target: 視覺化設計工具使用<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditor>RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet 類別，來選取個別的屬性以及類別`RouteUrl`運算式，並合併到選取的運算式屬性值`RouteUrl`運算式。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditor>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditor.GetExpressionEditorSheet%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method returns a RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditor.GetExpressionEditorSheet%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法會傳回 RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet 物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditor.GetExpressionEditorSheet%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: In the expressions dialog box, when you select a control property and bind it to a `RouteUrl` expression, the visual designer calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditor.GetExpressionEditorSheet%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 在 [運算式] 對話方塊中，當您選取的控制項屬性，並將它繫結`RouteUrl`運算式，視覺化設計工具會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditor.GetExpressionEditorSheet%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditor.GetExpressionEditorSheet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The visual designer uses the returned RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet object to prompt for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteValues%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteName%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 視覺化設計工具會使用傳回的 RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet 物件的提示<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteValues%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteName%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once the properties are selected, the visual designer calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.GetExpression%2A> method to combine the properties into a `RouteUrl` expression string.
trans-unit.target: 一旦選取屬性，視覺化設計工具就會呼叫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.GetExpression%2A>方法，將合併成屬性`RouteUrl`運算式字串。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.GetExpression%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteValues%2A> property must be specified if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteName%2A> property is not specified.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteValues%2A>必須指定屬性，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteName%2A>未指定屬性。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteName%2A> property must be specified if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteValues%2A> is not specified.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteName%2A>必須指定屬性，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteValues%2A>未指定。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteValues%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Both properties may be specified.
trans-unit.target: 指定這兩個屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The initial <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteValues%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteName%2A> property values are set using the input `expression` string.
trans-unit.target: 初始<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteValues%2A>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteName%2A>屬性值會設定使用的輸入`expression`字串。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteName%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.RouteUrlExpressionEditorSheet.RouteValues%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet.ServiceProvider%2A> property is set using the input `serviceProvider` implementation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet.ServiceProvider%2A>屬性會設定使用的輸入`serviceProvider`實作。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ExpressionEditorSheet.ServiceProvider%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_RouteUrl" name="RouteUrl" href=""></xref> expression, used to initialize the expression editor sheet.
trans-unit.target: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_RouteUrl" name="RouteUrl" href=""> </xref>運算式，用來初始化運算式編輯器工作表。

trans-unit.source: A service provider implementation supplied by the designer host, used to obtain additional design-time services.
trans-unit.target: 用來取得額外的設計階段服務設計工具主應用程式所提供的服務提供者實作。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref uid="langword_csharp_RouteUrl" name="RouteUrl" href=""></xref> expression that is formed by the expression editor sheet property values.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref uid="langword_csharp_RouteUrl" name="RouteUrl" href=""></xref>由運算式編輯器工作表的屬性值所構成的運算式。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_RouteUrl" name="RouteUrl" href=""></xref> expression string for the current settings in the sheet.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_RouteUrl" name="RouteUrl" href=""> </xref>工作表中的目前設定的運算式字串。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref uid="langword_csharp_RouteUrl" name="RouteUrl" href=""></xref> expression string is valid.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref uid="langword_csharp_RouteUrl" name="RouteUrl" href=""></xref>運算式字串是否有效。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref uid="langword_csharp_RouteUrl" name="RouteUrl" href=""></xref> expression string is valid; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_RouteUrl" name="RouteUrl" href=""></xref>運算式字串是否有效，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the route that a URL is to be generated for.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定所要產生的 URL 路由的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the route that a URL is to be generated for.
trans-unit.target: URL 的產生的路由名稱。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the URL parameter names and values that are to be used to generate a URL from a route.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 URL 參數名稱和要用來產生 URL 的路由中的值。

trans-unit.source: The URL parameter names and values that are to be used to generate a URL from a route.
trans-unit.target: URL 參數名稱和要用來產生 URL 的路由中的值。
